task.summary: Adding a trigger to watch for our Message container changes using the change feed and azure function feature from cosmodb ecosystem.
Adding dependency injection to the Azure function project.
Adding a backgroundservice and a azure functions to precess the item in our queue.
Implementing the updateUserAvatar code to update the user avatar in the message container.

MESSAGE.value: Adding a trigger to watch for our Message container changes using the change feed and azure function feature from cosmodb ecosystem.
Adding dependency injection to the Azure function project.
Adding a backgroundservice and a azure functions to precess the item in our queue.
Implementing the updateUserAvatar code to update the user avatar in the message container.
